attributes.action: Stop the redesign of our Nationa flag
attributes.additional_details: It feels like the FA are happy to allow a National Flag looking nothing like our St George’s Cross on our National strip because a manufacturer thinks it’s a modern twist! There should be no modern twist on any countries flag unless agreed by its population.
attributes.background: Make it illegal for any sports body to allow a change in the Nations individual fags and the Countries Union Flag.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the England football kit are a matter for the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
